title: \\\\\Terraria 1.2/////
author: awcjack
txt_content:
Terraria shared a link.Yesterday


The official soundtrack for Terraria 1.2 is now available! The update will still be out on October 1st!
http://re-logic.bandcamp.com/album/terraria-soundtrack-volume-2

https://www.facebook.com/TerrariaOfficial
官方FB發布~~~




http://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/1n9bmz/i_am_redigit_creator_of_terraria_ask_me_anything/
FREE~~~~~
作者:I am Redigit - Creator of Terraria. Ask Me Anything! (self.IAmA)
submitted 1 day ago by RedigitI've spent the last 7 months working on the 1.2 update for Terraria on PC. It will be available for free on Steam for anyone who owns the game.

replies.author: shure
replies.txt_content:
说是在十月一日发布泰拉瑞亚1.2的吧？不管是谁都很期待吧？
到时候可千万别空欢喜一场。

关于Starbound我都不想搭理了，说是要出了可结果却……都一年了喂，一个地址都没有！

Fores：你最后一句这明摆着是吐槽吧……
